name: Pane Rustico
description: Crispy homemade bread, 24 hour levitation, blend of four artisan italian flours, served with truffle or italian herb butter

name: Calamari
description: Fried, topped with parsley and served with a side of spicy mayonnaise

name: Burrata (V)
description: Fresh burrata cheese served with arugula and cherry tomatoes

name: Meatballs
description: Homemade ground beef meatballs made with bread crumbs and cheese, served with marinara sauce

name: Caesar Salad
description: Fresh lettuce, home made focaccia croutons, anchovies, shaved parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing

name: Gorgonzola Salad
description: Organic spring mix, gorgonzola cheese, crispy prosciutto, and dry apricots

name: Spinach Salad (V)
description: Spinach, feta, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, olives, and balsamic dressing
